structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS AS TO OFFICES AND OFFICERS -- SOCIAL SECURITY FOR PUBLIC EMPLOYEES -- EMPLOYEES RETIREMENT SYSTEM

law.text: The compensation of the TVA peace officers appointed and commissioned pursuant to KRS 61.886 to 61.892 shall be fixed and paid by TVA.
law.history: Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 79, sec. 6, effective June 17, 1978.
